Package main.gameObject

Class Team

java.lang.Object
main.gameObject.Team
Direct Known Subclasses:
Opponent
public class Team extends Object
Represent an object Team for user and opponents This class will give basic information about player Team. This class will use team roster only when this class use as opponent team.
Author:
Yang

      ArrayList<Athlete> roster

      public void setName(String name)
      Set Team Name
      Parameters:
      name - Team name (3 - 15) characters without any special characters

      public String getName()
      get method to return Team name
      Returns:
      Team name

    • getGameWin

      public int getGameWin()
      Get number of game this team played
      Returns:
      integer value about team's total matches played

    • getTotalGamePlay

      public int getTotalGamePlay()
      Get number of game this team won
      Returns:
      integer value about team's win on matches

    • getRoster

      public Athlete[] getRoster()
      get Team's Athletes roster in Array converted from ArrayList. Index 0 - 3 represent regular 4 - 6 represent reserves
      Returns:
      Athlete array player has

    • getInventory

      public Item[] getInventory()
      get Team(players) inventory in an array converted from the ArrayList
      Returns:
      Item array player has

    • getMoney

      public double getMoney()
      get total amount of money this team has.
      Returns:
      player's money in type double

    • setMoney

      public void setMoney(double price) throws RuntimeException
      Team's money control method. This method will add and subtract money that user earn or spend.
      Parameters:
      price - total price user earn or spend
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - (optional) throws LackOfMoneyException if team does not have enough money.

    • isQualify

      public void isQualify()
      Check method to check if this team meets the requirement to have match.

    • recruitAthletes

      public void recruitAthletes(Product athlete)
      Add athletes into roster after purchase them
      Parameters:
      athlete - an athlete that user purchased

    • leaveAthletes

      public void leaveAthletes(Product athlete)
      Remove an athlete from the roster. This method is for cases where a user sells an athlete or an athlete is injured.
      Parameters:
      athlete - target athlete's index that will be removed

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Product item)
      Add item into inventory after user purchase item.
      Parameters:
      item - Item that user purchased

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Product item)
      Remove an item from inventory if user use or sell the item.
      Parameters:
      item - target item's index that will be removed

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull(Product product)
      Check if roster and inventory is full
      Parameters:
      product - types of product user wants to purchase
      Returns:
      true if size of roster or inventory ArrayList exceed size limits defined as TOTAL_ATHLETE and TOTAL_ITEM

    • swapAthletes

      public void swapAthletes(int athlete1, int athlete2)
      Swap the position or order of athletes.
      Parameters:
      athlete1 - athlete to be swapped with athlete2
      athlete2 - athlete to be swapped with athlete1
